医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，患有系统性自身免疫性风湿性疾病的患者在感染 Omicron 后抗体反应低于健康对照者研究调查了系统性自身免疫性风湿病 (SARD) 患者的免疫反应是否降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Study-finds-that-病人-with-systemic-autoimmune-rheumatic-diseases-had-a-lower-antibody-response-than-healthy-controls- Omicron 感染后.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Study-finds-that-病人-with-systemic-autoimmune-rheumatic-diseases-had-a-lower-antibody-response-than-healthy-controls- after-Omicron-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52248cc8-1bc4-49af-88e9-15f7172585a6 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 10:00:00 -0400 Study finds that patients with systemic autoimmune rheumatic diseases had a lower antibody response than healthy controls after Omicron infection
医学生认识到人工智能在医学领域的潜力，呼吁进行伦理教育一组研究人员评估了医学生对人工智能相关的理解、看法和教育偏好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Medical-students-recognize-AIs-pottial-in-medicine-call-for-ethical-education.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Medical-students-recognize-AIs-pottial-in-medicine-call-for-ethical-education.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c76e3456-e315-4853-953d-1421b9c0d711 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 09:33:00 -0400 Medical students recognize AI's potential in medicine, call for ethical education
研究为 SARS-CoV-2 omicron 变体的紫外线敏感性提供了宝贵的见解严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 (SARS-CoV-2) 及其新变种在全球爆发，需要有效的消毒技术来预防有害病原体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Study-provides-valuable-insights-into-the-UV-susceptibility-of-SARS-CoV-2-omicron-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Study-provides-valuable-insights-into-the-UV-susceptibility-of-SARS-CoV-2-omicron-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48b77be2-2959-4fed-97c6-43b0bb44b74f Thu, 27 Jul 2023 09:19:15 -0400 Study provides valuable insights into the UV susceptibility of SARS-CoV-2 omicron variants
COVID-19 治疗：研究评估 ACEi 和 ARB 对临床结果的影响一组研究人员比较了血管紧张素转换酶抑制剂 (ACEi) 和血管紧张素 II 受体阻滞剂的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/COVID-19-treatment-study-evaluates-ACEi-and-ARB-effects-on-clinical-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/COVID-19-treatment-study-evaluates-ACEi-and-ARB-effects-on-clinical-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39e26ebd-52a6-45c8-b251-e4da32325d9e Thu, 27 Jul 2023 08:54:00 -0400 COVID-19 treatment: study evaluates ACEi and ARB effects on clinical outcomes
非洲婴儿乙型肝炎疫苗接种工作的最新进展研究人员报告了在消除乙型肝炎感染母婴传播方面取得的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Recent-progress-in-infant-hepatitis-B-vaccination-efforts-in-Africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Recent-progress-in-infant-hepatitis-B-vaccination-efforts-in-Africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29e445c8-c7dc-4839-b4d1-5dea5df29d9d Thu, 27 Jul 2023 08:45:00 -0400 Recent progress in infant hepatitis B vaccination efforts in Africa
研究显示，吸烟者更容易产生烟草依赖根据《尼古丁与烟草研究》7 月发表的西奈山研究，吸烟者比吸电子烟或使用各种烟草产品的人更容易产生烟草依赖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Tobacco-dependence-more-likely-in-香烟-smokers-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Tobacco-dependence-more-likely-in-香烟-smokers-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25ea7860-2dd7-4392-9295-554307788881 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 08:40:22 -0400 Tobacco dependence more likely in cigarette smokers, study reveals
新合作研究 RNA 修饰形式美因茨大学制药和生物医学科学研究所与莫纳什大学和苏黎世联邦理工学院合作研究 RNA 修饰的形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/New-collaboration-to-investigate-forms-of-RNA-modification.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/New-collaboration-to-investigate-forms-of-RNA-modification.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81b351be-b332-4143-accd-06cac04c6007 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 08:30:00 -0400 New collaboration to investigate forms of RNA modification
研究强调在应对大流行病时需要整合政策、行为改变和风险沟通研究人员测量了传染数之间的关联，传染数是每周实时测量严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 的指标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Study-highlights-need-for-integration-of-policy-behavior-change-and-risk-communication-in-pandemic-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Study-highlights-need-for-integration-of-policy-behavior-change-and-risk-communication-in-pandemic-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef0bcc66-7161-4ce6-8754-c105a6b0d605 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 08:05:00 -0400 Study highlights need for integration of policy, behavior change, and risk communication in pandemic response
温馨家园停车场：部分医院欢迎患者、家属、工作人员房车居住吉姆·韦弗（Jim Weaver）在过去十年中进行了两次大型手术：一次是切除膀胱中的癌性肿瘤，另一次是疏通阻塞的动脉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Home-sweet-parking-lot-Some-hospitals-welcome-RV-living-for-病人-families-and-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Home-sweet-parking-lot-Some-hospitals-welcome-RV-living-for-病人-families-and-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb371f96-016a-4c6f-a80d-36c789a450aa Thu, 27 Jul 2023 06:50:02 -0400 Home sweet parking lot: Some hospitals welcome RV living for patients, families, and workers
民主党议员赢得州长纽瑟姆的资助后，覆盖加州以削减患者费用民主党议员迫使州长加文·纽瑟姆兑现四年来的承诺，即利用对未参保者罚款的税收处罚收益来增加对低收入和中等收入加州人的医疗保险补贴，几周后，全覆盖加州官员宣布，他们将集中资金这笔钱用于减少许多因护理费用而苦苦挣扎的参保者的自付费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Covered-California-to-cut- Patient-costs-after-Democratic-lawmakers-win-funding-from-Gov-Newsom.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Covered-California-to-cut- Patient-costs-after-Democratic-lawmakers-win-funding-from-Gov-Newsom.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12138c57-711d-475b-930f-813dcb42a145 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 06:43:18 -0400 Covered California to cut patient costs after Democratic lawmakers win funding from Gov. Newsom
